languages.text: {n}Судя по характеру повреждений, все самые изуверские ранения были нанесены посмертно поверх ран, полученных при жизни — кто-то будто пытался помешать опознанию и определению причины смерти. Его убили быстро и с хирургической точностью, после чего вспороли глотку и подвесили вверх ногами, чтобы слить кровь.{/n}

{n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Судя по характеру повреждений, все самые изуверские ранения были нанесены посмертно поверх ран, полученных при жизни — кто-то будто пытался помешать опознанию и определению причины смерти. Его убили быстро и с хирургической точностью, после чего вспороли глотку и подвесили вверх ногами, чтобы слить кровь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Judging by the damage, each of the most brutal wounds was inflicted posthumously over the wounds the victim received when he was alive — it is as if someone had deliberately tried to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. In truth, the killer did the job quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain the blood.{/n}

{n}Judging by the damage, each of the most brutal wounds was inflicted posthumously over the wounds the victim received when he was alive — it is as if someone had deliberately tried to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. In truth, the killer did the job quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain the blood.{/n}

The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

{n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

{n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À en juger par les dégâts, les blessures les plus graves ont été infligées après la mort, de façon à masquer celles qui lui ont été infligées de son vivant, comme si on avait cherché à maquiller l'identité de la victime et la cause du décès. De toute évidence, le tueur a opéré rapidement et avec une précision chirurgicale, avant de suspendre le corps la tête en bas pour le vider de son sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À en juger par les dégâts, les blessures les plus graves ont été infligées après la mort, de façon à masquer celles qui lui ont été infligées de son vivant, comme si on avait cherché à maquiller l'identité de la victime et la cause du décès. De toute évidence, le tueur a opéré rapidement et avec une précision chirurgicale, avant de suspendre le corps la tête en bas pour le vider de son sang.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A juzgar por el daño, las heridas más brutales son de carácter póstumo, administradas por encima de las que fueron infligidas en vida. Es como si alguien quisiera dificultar la identificación de la víctima y de la causa de la muerte. A decir verdad, el asesino actuó de forma rápida y precisa, y después colgó cabeza abajo el cadáver para drenarlo de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A juzgar por el daño, las heridas más brutales son de carácter póstumo, administradas por encima de las que fueron infligidas en vida. Es como si alguien quisiera dificultar la identificación de la víctima y de la causa de la muerte. A decir verdad, el asesino actuó de forma rápida y precisa, y después colgó cabeza abajo el cadáver para drenarlo de sangre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}从伤口判断，那些极其血腥的伤口是死后造成的。新的伤口盖住了旧伤口，似乎有人打算干扰调查，让调查人员无法辨认受害者的身份与死因。但事实上，真正的凶手行动迅速，动作就像外科医生一样精准。凶手杀死受害者之后，便将尸体倒挂起来，放干了血。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}从伤口判断，那些极其血腥的伤口是死后造成的。新的伤口盖住了旧伤口，似乎有人打算干扰调查，让调查人员无法辨认受害者的身份与死因。但事实上，真正的凶手行动迅速，动作就像外科医生一样精准。凶手杀死受害者之后，便将尸体倒挂起来，放干了血。{/n}

languages.text: {n}被害状況から判断して、最も残忍な傷は、死後に負わされたものである。それらは被害者が生きている間に負わされた傷の上にできている。まるで、意図的に被害者と死因を特定しにくくしようと耕作したかのようだ。犯人はどうやら、外科的な知識を持ち、正確で素早く行動したようだ。死体を逆さ吊りにして、血を抜いたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}被害状況から判断して、最も残忍な傷は、死後に負わされたものである。それらは被害者が生きている間に負わされた傷の上にできている。まるで、意図的に被害者と死因を特定しにくくしようと耕作したかのようだ。犯人はどうやら、外科的な知識を持ち、正確で素早く行動したようだ。死体を逆さ吊りにして、血を抜いたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ihrem Ausmaß nach zu urteilen wurden die brutalsten Wunden postmortal zugefügt, über jene Wunden hinweg, die entstanden sind, als das Opfer noch lebte. Als hätte es jemand bewusst schwieriger machen wollen, das Opfer und die Todesursache zu identifizieren. Die Wahrheit ist, der Mörder hat schnell und mit chirurgischer Präzision gehandelt und die Leiche dann kopfüber aufgehängt, um sämtliches Blut abfließen zu lassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihrem Ausmaß nach zu urteilen wurden die brutalsten Wunden postmortal zugefügt, über jene Wunden hinweg, die entstanden sind, als das Opfer noch lebte. Die Wahrheit ist, der Mörder hat schnell und mit chirurgischer Präzision gehandelt und die Leiche dann kopfüber aufgehängt, um sämtliches Blut abfließen zu lassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hasara bakılırsa en gaddarca yaralar ölüm sonrasında açılmış. Yaraların büyük çoğunluğu ise kurbanın hayatta olduğu dakikalara ait. Sanki birisi, kasti olarak kurbanın kimliğinin ve ölüm nedeninin belirlenmesini zorlaştırmak istemiş. Hakikat şu ki katil, seri ve cerrahi bir titizlikle hareket etmiş. Ardından cesedi baş aşağı asarak kanını akıtmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by the damage, the most brutal wounds were administered posthumously, over the top of those inflicted while the victim was alive — it is as if someone deliberately wanted to make it harder to identify the victim and his cause of death. The truth is, the killer acted quickly and with surgical precision, then suspended the body upside down to drain its blood.{/n}
